channel.title: Posts on Kenny's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Kenny's Blog

item.title: Tmux
item.description: tmux Init tmux [xkd]$ tmux Create window ctl + b then c Create Pane (Tile Split) ctl + b then % # split the current pane vertically ctl + b then " # split the current pane horizontally Jump between Panes ctl + b then press arrow key # move to other pane ctl + b then o # jump to the next pane Resize Pane ctl + b then : resize-pane -D # Resizes the current pane down ctl + b then : resize-pane -U # Resizes the current pane upward ctl + b then : resize-pane -L # Resizes the current pane left ctl + b then : resize-pane -R # Resizes the current pane right ctl + b then : resize-pane -D 20 # Resizes the current pane down by 20 cells ctl + b then : resize-pane -U 20 # Resizes the current pane upward by 20 cells ctl + b then : resize-pane -L 20 # Resizes the current pane left by 20 cells ctl + b then : resize-pane -R 20 # Resizes the current pane right by 20 cells Close Pane ctl + b then x # close the current pane Show Pane ID ctl + b then q # show the IDs of the panes Zoom Pane ctl + b then z # toggle pane zoom

item.title: 從寫Code到Rpm
item.description: 目的 最近在公司將我們自己寫的Code要Deploy到RedHat 8或CentOS 8機器上， 所以選擇一些方便的工具來達成目標。 我的目的是可以將

item.title: 我的第一篇文章
item.description: 概論 這是一個我拿來記錄學習筆記的平台。 使用工具 Markdown Language Hugo Github Page Markdown Language 以前在公司寫 API 文件時，都是使用 Sphinx 來寫，也就是 reStructureText。 RST 跟
